ComicInfo.Title: Cracked Interviews the Gas King; Dragging the Wheel; Trampoline; The First Dollar; Ads for Adolescents; The Pot-Rich Family; Cracked Looks at World War I Sky Fighters; Celebrities and Their Screen Idols; Inside Henry Kissinger's Wallet; Rose Brawl Parade; Miss Weird Answers Your Etiquette Questions; The Candidaze
ComicInfo.Summary:
British editions are identical to the US editions except for the price and cover date. The UK numbering includes Cracked Collectors' Editions.A cavewoman is tired of being dragged by her hair so she invents the wheel - but the caveman drags the wheel instead of rolling it.
Hudd and Dini try to bounce over the prison walls with a trampoline but the guard has left a second trampoline out to bounce them back into the yard.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev36 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-04-05 17:38:07. [Issue ID 250468]
ComicInfo.Penciller: Charlie Rodrigues,John Langton,Lo Linkert,John Severin,Vic Martin,Bernard Baily,Bob Taylor
ComicInfo.Inker: Charlie Rodrigues,John Langton,Lo Linkert,John Severin,Vic Martin,Bernard Baily,Bob Taylor
